results.title: Comparison of treatment with lisinopril versus enalapril for congestive heart failure.
results.text_hl: ...The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 5-20 mg once daily or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ 5-20 mg once daily on exercise capacity, @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Premature_Complexes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018879 @@@ventricular ectopic activity@@@, and signs and symptoms of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ have been studied in 278 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with mild-to-moderate (@DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@New York Heart@@@ Association [NYHA] classes II and III) @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ in a randomized, double-blind, parallel-group study of 12 weeks' duration.

citations.NLM: Zannad F, van den Broek SA, Bory M. Comparison of treatment with lisinopril versus enalapril for congestive heart failure. Am J Cardiol. 1992 Oct 8;70(10):78C-83C. PMID: 1329478
citations.BibTeX: @article{1329478, title={Comparison of treatment with lisinopril versus enalapril for congestive heart failure.}, author={Zannad F and van den Broek SA and Bory M}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={70}, number={10}, pages={78C-83C}}

results.title: Protective effect of ACE inhibitors on ischemia-reperfusion-induced arrhythmias in rats: is this effect related to the free radical scavenging action of these drugs?
results.text_hl: The incidence of @DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@ventricular tachycardia@@@ (@DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@VT@@@) on @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ and reperfusion was significantly reduced by @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@Captopril@@@ and 1 mg kg-1 @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ also significantly decreased the number of @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Premature_Complexes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018879 @@@VEB@@@ during occlusion and the duration of @DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@VT@@@ on reperfusion, respectively.

citations.NLM: Birincioglu M, Aksoy T, Olmez E, Acet A. Protective effect of ACE inhibitors on ischemia-reperfusion-induced arrhythmias in rats: is this effect related to the free radical scavenging action of these drugs? Free Radic Res. 1997 Oct;27(4):389-96. PMID: 9416467
citations.BibTeX: @article{9416467, title={Protective effect of ACE inhibitors on ischemia-reperfusion-induced arrhythmias in rats: is this effect related to the free radical scavenging action of these drugs?}, author={Birincioglu M and Aksoy T and Olmez E and Acet A}, journal={Free Radic Res}, volume={27}, number={4}, pages={389-96}}
